text: Low level loader reading college basketball data bulk.

title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: can install development version cbbreadr like :

title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: functions take seasons argument seasons query. Data typically available 2003 present season, error thrown data available specified season. Calling functions -load data recent (current) college basketball season. return available seasons given resource, just pass TRUE argument function. functions load resources specified year, thus take argument.
code: # with no argument, returns most recent season load_games() # specify a single season load_games(2023) # specify a range of seasons load_games(2010:2015) # return all available seasons load_games(TRUE) # does not take any arguments load_conferences()

what: Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
title: Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
text: Pull college basketball games tracked collegebasketballdata.com Returns data NCAA D1 men's basketball games specified seasons. Includes contextual information, game took place , well high level box score data, scores team. return games past scheduled games. game scheduled opponents yet determined (.e., national championship game upcoming season), appear dataset.

title: Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
text: seasons integer vector integers seasons fetch data . Defaults recent season. Pass TRUE fetch seasons.

title: Load college basketball games for specified season(s) — load_games
text: dataframe games specified season(s).

title: get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
code: # \donttest{ most_recent_season() #> [1] 2025  # up to september, will be recorded as 2022 most_recent_season("2022-09-01") #> [1] 2025  # then will swap over to 2023 when we hit october most_recent_season("2022-10-01") #> [1] 2025 # }
